languages.text: "Ваши корабли разбиты, Крударах утерян, а с ним — и провидцы. Вы пожертвовали всем, чтобы напасть на этот мир. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Ваши корабли разбиты, Крударах утерян, а сним — и провидцы. Вы пожертвовали всем, чтобы напасть на этот мир. Почему?"

languages.text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Ваши корабли разбиты, Крударах утерян, а с ним — и провидцы. Вы пожертвовали всем, чтобы напасть на этот мир. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost and so are the seers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
"Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost and so are the seers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
"Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost and so are the seers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
"Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost and so are the seers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
"Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"
"Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

languages.text: «Vuestras naves han sido destruidas, habéis perdido Crudarach y con él a vuestros videntes. Lo habéis sacrificado todo para atacar este planeta. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «Vuestras naves han sido destruidas, habéis perdido Crudarach y con él a vuestros videntes. Lo habéis sacrificado todo para atacar este planeta. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: “你们的船被毁了，克鲁达拉赫也和那些先知一起陨落，可你还是不惜一切代价来攻击这个世界，这是为什么？”
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “你们的船被毁了，克鲁达拉赫也和那些先知一起陨落，可你还是不惜一切代价来攻击这个世界，这是为什么？”

languages.text: « Vos vaisseaux ont été détruits, Crudarach n'est plus et vos Grands Prophètes sont morts. Vous avez tout sacrifié pour attaquer ce monde. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Vos vaisseaux ont été détruits, Crudarach n'est plus et vos prophètes sont morts. Vous avez tout sacrifié pour attaquer ce monde. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: 「お前たちの船は破壊され、クルダラは失われ、先見司たちも失われた。お前は、この世界を攻撃するためにすべてを犠牲にした。なぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちの船は破壊され、クルダラは失われ、先見司たちも失われた。お前は、この世界を攻撃するためにすべてを犠牲にした。なぜだ？」

languages.text: "Eure Schiffe sind zerstört, Crudarach ist verloren, genau wie die Seher. Ihr habt alles geopfert, um diese Welt anzugreifen. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Schiffe sind zerstört, Crudarach ist verloren, genau wie die Seher. Ihr habt alles geopfert, um diese Welt anzugreifen. Warum?"

languages.text: "Gemileriniz yok edildi, Crudarach'ı da Ötesezenleri de kaybettiniz. Bu dünyaya saldırmak için her şeyi feda ettiniz. Neden?"
languages.original_text: "Your ships are destroyed, Crudarach is lost, and so are the Farseers. You sacrificed everything to attack this world. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Gemileriniz yok edildi, Crudarach'ı da Ötesezenleri de kaybettiniz. Bu dünyaya saldırmak için her şeyi feda ettiniz. Neden?"
